definition: mark/sign/label/to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc/to bear (a brand name, registration number etc)/prize/award/bid/target/quota/(old) the topmost branches of a tree/visible symptom/classifier for military units

pinyin: mu4 biao1 pi3 pei4 zuo4 ye4

sentences.english: They said the targe was out of reach.
sentences.chinese: 他們抱怨說這個目標無法達成。

sentences.english: The educational aim of Huijia School is to "be a great Chinese".
sentences.chinese: 匯佳學校的培養目標是“做一個偉大的中國人”。

sentences.english: More dramatic is the introduction of goal-driven search engine marketing campaigns.
sentences.chinese: 更戲劇性的是，目標驅動的搜索引擎營銷活動的介紹。

sentences.english: He can hold the ball, and be a target man.
sentences.chinese: 他可以護住球，也能成爲一個目標男。

sentences.english: Immediate turn right 90 degrees, fast moving target at 12 o'clock.
sentences.chinese: 立即右轉90度快速移動目標在正前方。

sentences.english: This approach leads to misalignment between the business goals and the developed services.
sentences.chinese: 這個方法將導致業務目標和所開發的服務間的不一致。

sentences.english: Yes. A specific subject-selection system allows the training coordinator to select relevant subjects for each target group.
sentences.chinese: 可以根據每一個目標羣設定相關的培訓主題。

sentences.english: Finally, an application example of excavator design was proposed to illuminate the reconstruction of traditional functions.
sentences.chinese: 最後，以挖掘機設計目標爲例，進行了函數改造說明。

sentences.english: Sing a song, Revision the target language in lesson 8 .
sentences.chinese: 目的是複習第8課的目標語言，引出新課。

sentences.english: The objective of RMC is to provide a comprehensive process solution for the enterprise.
sentences.chinese: RMC的目標是爲企業提供一個完整的過程解決方案。

sentences.english: If you do one thing each day, you'll reach your goal.
sentences.chinese: 如果你每天都做一件事，你會達到你的目標的。

sentences.english: The primary target for taggers in New York is the subway system.
sentences.chinese: 在紐約，“留名者”的首要目標是地鐵系統。

sentences.english: It is not mandatory to have attributes for all the three categories in a target.
sentences.chinese: 目標中不一定都有這三類屬性。

sentences.english: Kalec doesn't understand though. I've turn a new leaf.
sentences.chinese: 卡雷克根本什麼都不懂，我已經有了新的目標了。

sentences.english: Many of these can be derived from the schematics or the memory configuration of your target hardware.
sentences.chinese: 許多這些可以來源於圖表或對內存配置的目標硬件。

sentences.english: This should create the new library target.
sentences.chinese: 這應該會創建新的庫目標。

definition: plan/project/program/to plan/to map out/CL:個|个[ge4],項|项[xiang4]
to achieve/to implement/to realize/to bring about
to estimate/to reckon/CL:個|个[ge4]/(coll.) to suppose
outcome/result/conclusion/in the end/as a result/to kill/to dispatch
variant of 計劃|计划[ji4 hua4]
to fight for/to strive for/to win over
and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge
